_source.content: Christmas Where We Are ... By Eric MosherAs I sit here, yet another Christmas going by where I can‚Äôt be with the ones I love, it never gets any easier.I think of laughter with my friends and family, opening presents with my daughters, eating Christmas cookies (way too many‚Ä¶.), hugs and stories, all the holiday ‚Äúfeel goods.‚Äù I sure do miss it, that‚Äôs the truth. What helps me get by is the true meaning of Christmas. Our Almighty God, sending His one and only son as the ultimate gift. Jesus, in the flesh, born for us to die for us! Is there a greater gift? I sure can‚Äôt think of one. And all we have to do is believe and receive. I‚Äôm so thankful that I‚Äôve received that free gift of grace, and He‚Äôs prepared a place for me that‚Äôs so wonderful that words can‚Äôt explain it. I‚Äôm overjoyed by His giving to me, by His birth, death, and resurrection. He paid the price for the price I should be paying. Paid in full. I still have consequences to pay for my actions, but forgiveness was given. I wouldn‚Äôt be able to get through these hard times without Christ. I may be able to get through them to a certain extent, but how I get through them, to me, makes all the difference. I‚Äôm grateful this holiday season to really think of receiving the ultimate gift of eternal life through Jesus Christ, my Savior.     ... by Eric MosherEDITOR'S NOTE:  Please send your encouraging comments and notes to our ministry member and author, Eric, at the following address (He would love to hear from you!):SMART COMMUNICATIONS / PADOCEric Mosher, QA0727SCI MahanoyPO Box 33028St. Petersburg, FL 33733(Published on http://www.PrisonMentoring.com where you can find many inspiring articles written by Christian inmates!)   The Perfect Worship by Alexis RodriquezThe perfect worship is not the consciousness of my sinnor reiterating my imperfections over and over again.Nor is it to fall in love in rapturous devotion misunderstood,but rather to do Your will daily, effectively, humbly.What are my eyes for if they cannot see You, All-seeing?For real I am lame 'cause having feet and ability, I go nowhere and do nothing but run away! Oh, if I had wings that would serve me to serve You! At their service take flight attracted to the streamfor effortless rest to joyous buoyancy from this encumbered life heavy with its burdens.Pastor Creflo Dollar says, "continual appreciation for the acts of God" with concerted "intentional worship" of thankfulness..."Here is God's will for you, to be thankful in all circumstances ". Do yourself a favor and operate this way in your life. "God is waiting for your thanksgiving to perfect His will in your life". In my current circumstance of being incarcerated, believe me it's hard to acknowledge this, because I look for encouragement from the outside. Yet, I try to do as King David, who encouraged himself in the Lord. Thanksgiving opens the door to the supernatural. So if there is anything broken or missing in your life...BE MADE WHOLE IN HIM THROUGH THANKSGIVING!     ... by Alexis RodriguezEDITOR'S NOTE:  Please send your encouraging comments and notes to my dear friend, poet, and author of many articles, "Lex", at the following address (He would love to hear from  you!):SCI DallasPO Box 33028SMART COMMUNICATIONS / PADOCAlexis Rodriguez, BH6734St. Petersburg, FL 33733

(Published on http://www.PrisonMentoring.com where you can find many inspiring articles written by Christian inmates!)

The Perfect Worship by Alexis Rodriquez
The perfect worship is not the consciousness of my sin
nor reiterating my imperfections over and over again.
Nor is it to fall in love in rapturous devotion misunderstood,
but rather to do Your will daily, effectively, humbly.
What are my eyes for if they cannot see You, All-seeing?
For real I am lame 'cause having feet and ability, I go nowhere and do nothing but run away! Oh, if I had wings that would serve me to serve You! At their service take flight attracted to the stream
for effortless rest to joyous buoyancy from this encumbered life heavy with its burdens.
Pastor Creflo Dollar says, "continual appreciation for the acts of God" with concerted "intentional worship" of thankfulness..."Here is God's will for you, to be thankful in all circumstances ". Do yourself a favor and operate this way in your life. "God is waiting for your thanksgiving to perfect His will in your life". In my current circumstance of being incarcerated, believe me it's hard to acknowledge this, because I look for encouragement from the outside. Yet, I try to do as King David, who encouraged himself in the Lord. Thanksgiving opens the door to the supernatural. So if there is anything broken or missing in your life...BE MADE WHOLE IN HIM THROUGH THANKSGIVING! ... by Alexis Rodriguez

_source.content: 1/2/23 The Daily Skirmish - Kick Woke Criminal Justice Reforms to the CurbLinks at http://www.liberato.us/the-daily-skirmish.htmlThe Illinois Supreme Court halted the state‚Äôs new law eliminating cash bail pending further litigation.  Good.  Maybe sanity will prevail in the end.  Here‚Äôs what no-cash bail laws do:  A New York man was arrested for beating his wife.  He was released on no bail.  Less than 24 hours later, he shot her dead in front of her three children.  The no-bail situation in New York City has gotten so bad, Mayor Eric Adams now calls it ‚Äòcatch and release‚Äô and said, ‚ÄúWe have to stop passing laws that protect the guilty.‚ÄùEric Adams might finally be telling the truth, but other Democrats who brought you insane ideas like no-bail are now trying to cover up the consequences of their insanity.  In Chicago, the mayor - who condones riots - wants to switch from police scanners to encrypted radio frequencies.  This will prevent journalists from reporting breaking crime stories and the public from learning about threats to their safety.  In Colorado, a Democrat senator‚Äôs wife is urging lawmakers to defund the police the sneaky way by reallocating funds to social services.  In case you don‚Äôt know, several cities got mugged by the reality of what happens when you defund the police and moved to re-fund their police departments.  But not in Seattle, which has found another sneaky way to defund the police.  The tolerance for riots and disparagement of police professionals caused a number of vacant positions in the police department and the city council voted last month to eliminate 80 of them.  But try as they might, the stupid Democrats can‚Äôt cover up the fact that large cities like Chicago, New York, Philadelphia, and Los Angeles are now more dangerous than war zones like Iraq or Afghanistan for young males.  The most dangerous city is actually St. Louis where the progressive prosecutor won‚Äôt accept arrests by 300 officers and the mayor won‚Äôt authorize pay increases for officers, causing the police department to operate at less than half strength.  Staffing shortages and progressive prosecutors are being blamed for the rise in violent crime in many cities across the country last year.And Democrats can‚Äôt cover up the fact that Target lost $400 million last year to organized retail theft.  Overall, retail theft is up more than 26 percent and is closing in on $100 billion a year.  Houston - and elsewhere - we got a problem.  Walmart is warning it will have to raise prices and close stores, if this keeps up.  The CEO specifically blamed progressive prosecutors and their soft-on-crime policies.  The violence is so bad in North Philly, a gas station owner hired armed security.  Police don‚Äôt respond and nobody feels safe, he said.  A restaurant in D.C. is closing down because employees are being attacked and their cars are being broken into.  The insane Democrats who run the city voted late last year to reduce penalties for illegal gun possession, carjacking, robbery, and other crimes. Another business closed, this one in Portland, another Democrat city that loves riots.  The owner cited ‚Äúunrelenting criminal behavior‚Äù and ‚Äúescalating safety issues‚Äù for employees. ‚ÄúWe have no protection, or recourse, against the criminal behavior that goes unpunished,‚Äù an open letter posted on the front door said.  Here‚Äôs the interesting part:  You hear these progressive prosecutors and other apologists for high crime say, ‚Äòdon‚Äôt worry about it, insurance will cover any losses.‚Äô  Not true.  The owner went on to write: ‚ÄúDo not be fooled into thinking that insurance companies cover losses. We have sustained 15 break-ins ‚Ä¶ we have not received any financial reimbursement since the 3rd.‚ÄùThink about all this the next time the Democrats are flashing you a big smile and asking you to keep them in power.  Better yet, take action now.  The city council in Roanoke recently asked state lawmakers to undo the Democrats‚Äô woke criminal justice reforms and bring back no-knock warrants, traffic stops for broken tail lights and other minor infractions, and holding suspects without bond for violent offenses.  Voters in Democrat-controlled Kansas City, Missouri voted up a constitutional amendment requiring the city to spend more on police.  This is not a situation where reforms swing between competing values on a pendulum.  The Democrats threw the pendulum out the window with their woke criminal justice reforms.  But this is still America and citizens like you can take action so they can‚Äôt turn your life into a war zone.

_source.content: Adam Kinzinger Lies About Ray Epps Again, and We Should Probably Figure out WhyRed State ^ | 01/01/2022 | Bonchiehttps://redstate.com/bonchie/2023/01/01/adam-kinzinger-lies-about-ray-epps-again-and-we-should-probably-figure-out-why-n681818The January 6 committee recently ended with a whimper after a year of pomp and circumstance. Despite much manipulation of information by its members, the committee‚Äôs report garnered all of about eight hours of headline news before quickly burning out.Why? Because there was almost nothing revealed that we didn‚Äôt already know in it, and no matter how much Liz Cheney, Adam Schiff, and the rest insisted otherwise, they themselves never produced an ounce of evidence that Donald Trump orchestrated and was responsible for the Capitol breach.Still, there was something interesting shown in the testimony of now-infamous Ray Epps, the man who was caught on video multiple times telling people to enter the Capitol Building on January 6th. While the committee‚Äôs final report never mentions him, he apparently stated ‚ÄúI also orchestrated it‚Äù in relation to the events of that day.Yet, for some reason, Adam Kinzinger rushed to social media on Sunday morning to defend Epps.Literally completely untrue. https://t.co/hUbgqujLht‚Äî Adam Kinzinger #fella (@AdamKinzinger) January 1, 2023It‚Äôs worth noting that this is the second time that Kinzinger has gone to bat for Epps. He did so in January 2022, actually painting the man who helped incite the riot at the Capitol as a sympathetic figure. It was one of the weirder moments of the entire January 6th saga. More importantly, though, Kinzinger is lying, and he‚Äôs lying in a way that is very easily exposed.Look at the language the ousted Illinois congressman uses. In response to someone saying ‚ÄúRay Epps is on video encouraging the riot and admitted such in a sworn statement,‚Äù Kinzinger claims it is ‚Äúliterally completely untrue.‚Äù Now, I‚Äôm no linguist, but I‚Äôm pretty sure I know what the words ‚Äúliterally‚Äù and ‚Äúcompletely‚Äù mean, and they would indicate that nothing in Eric Matheny‚Äôs statement is true.But as I noted above, Epps is on video multiple times telling people to attack the Capitol Building. He was also present on January 6th and appears to have ordered the first attack (that‚Äôs also on video, as shown below). Further, he does indeed say in his sworn testimony that he ‚Äúalso orchestrated it.‚ÄùLadies and gentlemen, @AdamKinzinger, member of the ‚Äúbipartisan‚Äù Jan. 6 Committee, literally spreading lies about Jan. 6. https://t.co/sXn3rxnDEQ http://pic.twitter.com/wUb0tpO1ye‚Äî Viva Frei (@thevivafrei) January 1, 2023@AdamKinzinger https://t.co/Ons2tP4eOK http://pic.twitter.com/RX6hXqeh3d‚Äî Mike Englemanüá∫üá≤ (@RealHickory) January 1, 2023Why is a congressman who served on the January 6 committee outright lying about something that is so obviously true? The videos of Epps are not new and have been circulating since 2021. He clearly and unambiguously incited the riot and the entry into the Capitol Building. In fact, when you watch the different clips of him, he seems to be very well rehearsed in what he‚Äôs saying and doing.That he was never arrested while grandmas who took selfies were thrown into solitary confinement has always been a major red flag. Given that, perhaps we should figure out why Kinzinger keeps defending the one man with the most evidence of incitement against him in relation to January 6th. Wasn‚Äôt the committee‚Äôs entire justification for existing to find out why the attack happened? Yet, they completely ignore the man who instigated it?None of that makes any sense unless you begin to think the worst, which is that the government was involved. But hey, I‚Äôm sitting here typing this, willing to hear a reasonable explanation for why Epps was ignored by the committee and has never been arrested. If Kinzinger has one, he‚Äôs welcome to share it because lying about what happened isn‚Äôt convincing anyone.Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-Ill.)https://gab.com/Agitators/posts/107578479186594175Contact:http://kinzinger.house.gov/https://www.facebook.com/RepKinzingerhttps://www.instagram.com/adam_kinzinger/People in PoliticsPage 1 https://gab.com/Agitators/posts/108487037613807087The #J6 Coup Leadershttps://gab.com/Agitators/posts/109529724382369364#J6 #CoupLeaders #NancyPelosi #BennieThompson #LizCheney #AdamKinzinger #ElaineLuria #JamieRaskin #StephanieMurphy #PeteAguilar #AdamSchiff #ZoeLofgren
_source.contentraw:
Adam Kinzinger Lies About Ray Epps Again, and We Should Probably Figure out Why
Red State ^ | 01/01/2022 | Bonchie
https://redstate.com/bonchie/2023/01/01/adam-kinzinger-lies-about-ray-epps-again-and-we-should-probably-figure-out-why-n681818

The January 6 committee recently ended with a whimper after a year of pomp and circumstance. Despite much manipulation of information by its members, the committee‚Äôs report garnered all of about eight hours of headline news before quickly burning out.

Why? Because there was almost nothing revealed that we didn‚Äôt already know in it, and no matter how much Liz Cheney, Adam Schiff, and the rest insisted otherwise, they themselves never produced an ounce of evidence that Donald Trump orchestrated and was responsible for the Capitol breach.

Still, there was something interesting shown in the testimony of now-infamous Ray Epps, the man who was caught on video multiple times telling people to enter the Capitol Building on January 6th. While the committee‚Äôs final report never mentions him, he apparently stated ‚ÄúI also orchestrated it‚Äù in relation to the events of that day.

Yet, for some reason, Adam Kinzinger rushed to social media on Sunday morning to defend Epps.

Literally completely untrue. https://t.co/hUbgqujLht

‚Äî Adam Kinzinger #fella (@AdamKinzinger) January 1, 2023

It‚Äôs worth noting that this is the second time that Kinzinger has gone to bat for Epps. He did so in January 2022, actually painting the man who helped incite the riot at the Capitol as a sympathetic figure. It was one of the weirder moments of the entire January 6th saga. More importantly, though, Kinzinger is lying, and he‚Äôs lying in a way that is very easily exposed.

Look at the language the ousted Illinois congressman uses. In response to someone saying ‚ÄúRay Epps is on video encouraging the riot and admitted such in a sworn statement,‚Äù Kinzinger claims it is ‚Äúliterally completely untrue.‚Äù Now, I‚Äôm no linguist, but I‚Äôm pretty sure I know what the words ‚Äúliterally‚Äù and ‚Äúcompletely‚Äù mean, and they would indicate that nothing in Eric Matheny‚Äôs statement is true.

But as I noted above, Epps is on video multiple times telling people to attack the Capitol Building. He was also present on January 6th and appears to have ordered the first attack (that‚Äôs also on video, as shown below). Further, he does indeed say in his sworn testimony that he ‚Äúalso orchestrated it.‚Äù

Ladies and gentlemen, @AdamKinzinger, member of the ‚Äúbipartisan‚Äù Jan. 6 Committee, literally spreading lies about Jan. 6. https://t.co/sXn3rxnDEQ http://pic.twitter.com/wUb0tpO1ye

‚Äî Viva Frei (@thevivafrei) January 1, 2023

@AdamKinzinger https://t.co/Ons2tP4eOK http://pic.twitter.com/RX6hXqeh3d

‚Äî Mike Englemanüá∫üá≤ (@RealHickory) January 1, 2023

Why is a congressman who served on the January 6 committee outright lying about something that is so obviously true? The videos of Epps are not new and have been circulating since 2021. He clearly and unambiguously incited the riot and the entry into the Capitol Building. In fact, when you watch the different clips of him, he seems to be very well rehearsed in what he‚Äôs saying and doing.

That he was never arrested while grandmas who took selfies were thrown into solitary confinement has always been a major red flag. Given that, perhaps we should figure out why Kinzinger keeps defending the one man with the most evidence of incitement against him in relation to January 6th. Wasn‚Äôt the committee‚Äôs entire justification for existing to find out why the attack happened? Yet, they completely ignore the man who instigated it?

None of that makes any sense unless you begin to think the worst, which is that the government was involved. But hey, I‚Äôm sitting here typing this, willing to hear a reasonable explanation for why Epps was ignored by the committee and has never been arrested. If Kinzinger has one, he‚Äôs welcome to share it because lying about what happened isn‚Äôt convincing anyone.

Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-Ill.)

_source.content: Adam Kinzinger Lies About Ray Epps Again, and We Should Probably Figure out WhyRed State ^ | 01/01/2022 | Bonchiehttps://redstate.com/bonchie/2023/01/01/adam-kinzinger-lies-about-ray-epps-again-and-we-should-probably-figure-out-why-n681818The January 6 committee recently ended with a whimper after a year of pomp and circumstance. Despite much manipulation of information by its members, the committee‚Äôs report garnered all of about eight hours of headline news before quickly burning out.Why? Because there was almost nothing revealed that we didn‚Äôt already know in it, and no matter how much Liz Cheney, Adam Schiff, and the rest insisted otherwise, they themselves never produced an ounce of evidence that Donald Trump orchestrated and was responsible for the Capitol breach.Still, there was something interesting shown in the testimony of now-infamous Ray Epps, the man who was caught on video multiple times telling people to enter the Capitol Building on January 6th. While the committee‚Äôs final report never mentions him, he apparently stated ‚ÄúI also orchestrated it‚Äù in relation to the events of that day.Yet, for some reason, Adam Kinzinger rushed to social media on Sunday morning to defend Epps.Literally completely untrue. https://t.co/hUbgqujLht‚Äî Adam Kinzinger #fella (@AdamKinzinger) January 1, 2023It‚Äôs worth noting that this is the second time that Kinzinger has gone to bat for Epps. He did so in January 2022, actually painting the man who helped incite the riot at the Capitol as a sympathetic figure. It was one of the weirder moments of the entire January 6th saga. More importantly, though, Kinzinger is lying, and he‚Äôs lying in a way that is very easily exposed.Look at the language the ousted Illinois congressman uses. In response to someone saying ‚ÄúRay Epps is on video encouraging the riot and admitted such in a sworn statement,‚Äù Kinzinger claims it is ‚Äúliterally completely untrue.‚Äù Now, I‚Äôm no linguist, but I‚Äôm pretty sure I know what the words ‚Äúliterally‚Äù and ‚Äúcompletely‚Äù mean, and they would indicate that nothing in Eric Matheny‚Äôs statement is true.But as I noted above, Epps is on video multiple times telling people to attack the Capitol Building. He was also present on January 6th and appears to have ordered the first attack (that‚Äôs also on video, as shown below). Further, he does indeed say in his sworn testimony that he ‚Äúalso orchestrated it.‚ÄùLadies and gentlemen, @AdamKinzinger, member of the ‚Äúbipartisan‚Äù Jan. 6 Committee, literally spreading lies about Jan. 6. https://t.co/sXn3rxnDEQ http://pic.twitter.com/wUb0tpO1ye‚Äî Viva Frei (@thevivafrei) January 1, 2023@AdamKinzinger https://t.co/Ons2tP4eOK http://pic.twitter.com/RX6hXqeh3d‚Äî Mike Englemanüá∫üá≤ (@RealHickory) January 1, 2023Why is a congressman who served on the January 6 committee outright lying about something that is so obviously true? The videos of Epps are not new and have been circulating since 2021. He clearly and unambiguously incited the riot and the entry into the Capitol Building. In fact, when you watch the different clips of him, he seems to be very well rehearsed in what he‚Äôs saying and doing.That he was never arrested while grandmas who took selfies were thrown into solitary confinement has always been a major red flag. Given that, perhaps we should figure out why Kinzinger keeps defending the one man with the most evidence of incitement against him in relation to January 6th. Wasn‚Äôt the committee‚Äôs entire justification for existing to find out why the attack happened? Yet, they completely ignore the man who instigated it?None of that makes any sense unless you begin to think the worst, which is that the government was involved. But hey, I‚Äôm sitting here typing this, willing to hear a reasonable explanation for why Epps was ignored by the committee and has never been arrested. If Kinzinger has one, he‚Äôs welcome to share it because lying about what happened isn‚Äôt convincing anyone.Rep. _source.contentraw:
Adam Kinzinger Lies About Ray Epps Again, and We Should Probably Figure out Why
Red State ^ | 01/01/2022 | Bonchie
https://redstate.com/bonchie/2023/01/01/adam-kinzinger-lies-about-ray-epps-again-and-we-should-probably-figure-out-why-n681818

The January 6 committee recently ended with a whimper after a year of pomp and circumstance. Despite much manipulation of information by its members, the committee‚Äôs report garnered all of about eight hours of headline news before quickly burning out.

Why? Because there was almost nothing revealed that we didn‚Äôt already know in it, and no matter how much Liz Cheney, Adam Schiff, and the rest insisted otherwise, they themselves never produced an ounce of evidence that Donald Trump orchestrated and was responsible for the Capitol breach.

Still, there was something interesting shown in the testimony of now-infamous Ray Epps, the man who was caught on video multiple times telling people to enter the Capitol Building on January 6th. While the committee‚Äôs final report never mentions him, he apparently stated ‚ÄúI also orchestrated it‚Äù in relation to the events of that day.

Yet, for some reason, Adam Kinzinger rushed to social media on Sunday morning to defend Epps.

Literally completely untrue. https://t.co/hUbgqujLht

‚Äî Adam Kinzinger #fella (@AdamKinzinger) January 1, 2023

It‚Äôs worth noting that this is the second time that Kinzinger has gone to bat for Epps. He did so in January 2022, actually painting the man who helped incite the riot at the Capitol as a sympathetic figure. It was one of the weirder moments of the entire January 6th saga. More importantly, though, Kinzinger is lying, and he‚Äôs lying in a way that is very easily exposed.

Look at the language the ousted Illinois congressman uses. In response to someone saying ‚ÄúRay Epps is on video encouraging the riot and admitted such in a sworn statement,‚Äù Kinzinger claims it is ‚Äúliterally completely untrue.‚Äù Now, I‚Äôm no linguist, but I‚Äôm pretty sure I know what the words ‚Äúliterally‚Äù and ‚Äúcompletely‚Äù mean, and they would indicate that nothing in Eric Matheny‚Äôs statement is true.

But as I noted above, Epps is on video multiple times telling people to attack the Capitol Building. He was also present on January 6th and appears to have ordered the first attack (that‚Äôs also on video, as shown below). Further, he does indeed say in his sworn testimony that he ‚Äúalso orchestrated it.‚Äù

Ladies and gentlemen, @AdamKinzinger, member of the ‚Äúbipartisan‚Äù Jan. 6 Committee, literally spreading lies about Jan. 6. https://t.co/sXn3rxnDEQ http://pic.twitter.com/wUb0tpO1ye

‚Äî Viva Frei (@thevivafrei) January 1, 2023

@AdamKinzinger https://t.co/Ons2tP4eOK http://pic.twitter.com/RX6hXqeh3d

‚Äî Mike Englemanüá∫üá≤ (@RealHickory) January 1, 2023

Why is a congressman who served on the January 6 committee outright lying about something that is so obviously true? The videos of Epps are not new and have been circulating since 2021. He clearly and unambiguously incited the riot and the entry into the Capitol Building. In fact, when you watch the different clips of him, he seems to be very well rehearsed in what he‚Äôs saying and doing.

That he was never arrested while grandmas who took selfies were thrown into solitary confinement has always been a major red flag. Given that, perhaps we should figure out why Kinzinger keeps defending the one man with the most evidence of incitement against him in relation to January 6th. Wasn‚Äôt the committee‚Äôs entire justification for existing to find out why the attack happened? Yet, they completely ignore the man who instigated it?

None of that makes any sense unless you begin to think the worst, which is that the government was involved. But hey, I‚Äôm sitting here typing this, willing to hear a reasonable explanation for why Epps was ignored by the committee and has never been arrested. If Kinzinger has one, he‚Äôs welcome to share it because lying about what happened isn‚Äôt convincing anyone.

Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-Ill.)
https://gab.com/Agitators/posts/107578479186594175

Contact:
http://kinzinger.house.gov/
https://www.facebook.com/RepKinzinger
https://www.instagram.com/adam_kinzinger/

2023 Psychological Warfare Year 3?

President Trump is starting out 2023 by telling more cold hard truths about the fake narrative of the ‚Äúsave our democracy‚Äù coup who are pushing their progressive Marxist Agenda ‚Äì Including all the RINO republicans. With a Happy New Year to all MAGA supporters and those who love America.

So while the fake news and Forbes are dissecting Trump‚Äôs tax returns and trying to figure out if Trump‚Äôs DC Hotel is worth $175 million or $168 million‚Ä¶ and writing about that‚Ä¶ Trump just sold it for $400 million. Once again, showing how lame, and illiterate the fake news is when it comes to finances and understanding anything to do with a tax return and especially assets versus liabilities and how audits work and values of real property are equated, and most of all‚Ä¶ factoring in the Trump Brand that they tried and continue to try to tarnish so badly.

President Trump just can‚Äôt seem to get it through the heads of fake news that the people want the truth. They keep doing the wrong thing over and over and over again and somehow think they will succeed at having a NOW critical thinking public believe their lies. That is not going to happen.

Click here to see video: Eric Bolling: The Most Ridiculous Political Witch-hunt in U.S. History (http://rumble.com)

Trump on Truth Social posted,

‚ÄúWow!!! So while Trump Hating CNN & MSNBC RATINGS are both at record lows, numbers that they have never seen before, Fox News Ratings are also way down because they never say ‚ÄúTrump‚Äù or TRUTH, never talk about the Rigged Presidential Election, and is a Fake Polling Network. Our giant MAGA base, much bigger than anyone knows, does not like watching Fox play their games. Their Ratings will continue to sink. MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!‚Äù Donald J. Trump

Once again, President Trump is right! People have caught on to all the lies and are now spotting the liars and questioning all things. Even die hard democrats are now questioning the mob rule mentality of democracy. Many never understood that Pelosi‚Äôs democracy was a rigged and frauded election where the puppet masters appointed a bunch of seats in the congress and senate. It was never a fair election, nor was it ever a representation of We The People. This is the same election appointment fraud schemes that also take place on the state and local levels.

If we heard ‚ÄúSAVE OUR DEMOCRACY‚Äù once, we heard it as many times as we heard ‚Äúhello‚Äù when we answer our phones. All the deep state needs are a majority of puppet heads in government seats and their mob rule is pushed to whatever they want as they shout they are the majority and the majority rules.

Even constituents in democratic cities were not all on board for their form of Marxist Nazi governing, that left them jobless, homeless, penniless, and inflation so high they can barely afford the basics of energy, food, water and gasoline. Many liberals and democrats were never believing there was such a thing as a new world order where all things were rationed and only those selected would be granted freedoms and rights. Now they are seeing a big communist push. One they were totally blind to seeing. And many are crying out for law and order as they cannot go anywhere without worrying about getting robbed, hit, or killed by lawless, desperate crazy people. Many have been crippled and died from the jabs and now many who believed the lies and pushed it as something that everyone must do have jab remorse.

This is all part of their global RESET Agenda WHOSE GREATEST WEAPON IS FEAR!

We are at war and in this war and we are all being subjected to the same PSYCHOLOGICAL WARFARE ‚Äì it is up to us to know what is truth and what is a fake narrative!

In 2014 OBAMA MADE IT LEGAL TO USE PSYCOLOGICAL WARFARE ON AMERICAN PEOPLE. YOU ARE BEING LIED TO AT EVERY TURN TO CREATE FEAR SO YOU WILL DO AS THE UNCONSTITUTIONAL LAWLESS GOVERNMENT TELLS YOU TO DO. DO NOT FEAR! This is one big, fat, drama show to have you self destruct from fear.

That is not to say bad and horrific things aren‚Äôt happening. They are happening. It is to say that a lot of what they are saying is NOT HAPPENING AND WILL ONLY HAPPEN IF YOU DO AS THEY TELL YOU TO DO.

When it gets so bad that you have no privacy in your own home for everything has a tracking device in it from your cell phone to your appliances, that‚Äôs bad enough and quite an eye opener. But, when the school system has become a cross between a live science lab and an eugenics experimental playground where they spend more time on sex education, and showing children how to be a furry, and confuse a girl she is really a boy and a boy he is really a girl and encourage transgendering without parents permission‚Ä¶then it is no longer safe to even send your child to a public school. But fear not. Instead, home school or find a private school until the scourge passes over.

Prepare our youth with truth‚Ä¶ they need your support!
